data.chText: 遭遇，遇到（尤指令人不快或困难的事）
data.enText: to experience sth, especially sth unpleasant or difficult, while you are trying to do sth else

data.chText: 我们在第一周遇到了一些困难。
data.enText: We encountered a number of difficulties in the first week.

data.chText: 我以前从未遇到过这么大的阻力。
data.enText: I had never encountered such resistance before.

data.chText: 偶然碰到；意外地遇见；与…邂逅
data.enText: to meet sb, or discover or experience sth, especially sb/sth new, unusual or unexpected

data.chText: 她是他所见到过的最出色的女性。
data.enText: She was the most remarkable woman he had ever encountered.

data.chText: （意外、突然或暴力的）相遇，邂逅，遭遇，冲突
data.enText: a meeting, especially one that is sudden, unexpected or violent

data.chText: 他们中有三个人在后来与警察的冲突中被杀死。
data.enText: Three of them were killed in the subsequent encounter with the police.

data.chText: 这个故事描述了一个男人与一只海豚之间的奇遇。
data.enText: The story describes the extraordinary encounter between a man and a dolphin.

data.chText: 我好几次都险些与技术不佳的司机相撞。
data.enText: I've had a number of close encounters (= situations that could have been dangerous) with bad drivers.

data.chText: 那是他的第一次性经历。
data.enText: It was his first sexual encounter (= first experience of sex).
a sports match against a particular player or team

data.chText: 她在以前的所有交锋中都击败了这个对手。
data.enText: She has beaten her opponent in all of their previous encounters.

means: 遇到(尤指令人不快或困难的事)

ex.chText: 猜猜我在购物中心遇到谁了？
ex.enText: Guess who I met in the shopping mall?

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指偶然相遇或在事先约好的地方与某人见面，不用被动语态。

ex.chText: 她在城里遇见了前男友。
ex.enText: She bumped into her ex-boyfriend in town.

synonyms.bx: 指意外地遇见相识的人。

ex.chText: 她在上学的路上偶然遇见了他。
ex.enText: She came across him on her way to school.

ex.chText: 他在她的抽屉里偶然发现了一枚戒指。
ex.enText: He came across a ring in her drawer.

synonyms.bx: 指偶然遇见或发现某人或某物。

ex.chText: 该组织面临的阻碍是巨大的。
ex.enText: The obstacles confronting the organization are enormous.

synonyms.bx: 通常指遇到问题、困境等。

ex.chText: 新来的经理在第一周遇到了一些困难。
ex.enText: The new manager encountered some difficulties in his first week.

ex.chText: 董事会的裁员计划遭到了强烈的反对。
ex.enText: The board has encountered strong opposition to its plan to reduce employees.

ex.chText: 你第一次遇到他是在什么时候？
ex.enText: When did you first encounter him?

synonyms.bx: 尤指遇到困难、问题或他人的反对，也指偶遇某人。

ex.chText: 他正面临一项艰巨的任务。
ex.enText: He is facing a difficult task.

ex.chText: 吵架之后，她不知该如何面对他。
ex.enText: She didn't know how to face him after their quarrel.

synonyms.bx: 指面临必须处理的困难局面，或指与某人交往，而这种交往通常令人不快或难以应对。

ex.enText: I ran/came across him in the cafeteria.

ex.chText: 她在清理抽屉的时候发现了一本旧日记。
ex.enText: She ran/came across an old diary while clearing out her drawer.

synonyms.bx: 词义同 come across，常可换用。

ex.chText: 他因讲了个下流笑话而受到批评。
ex.enText: He ran into criticism after he had told a dirty joke.

ex.chText: 他的公司陷入了经济困境。
ex.enText: His company ran into financial difficulties.

ex.chText: 猜猜今天早上我碰见了谁！
ex.enText: Guess who I ran into this morning!

synonyms.bx: 指遇到困难或不利局势，也可指偶然碰见某人。

tr: a casual meeting with a person or thing

example: he still remembers their meeting in Paris
there was a brief encounter in the hallway

tr: contend against an opponent in a sport, game, or battle

example: I'll probably see you at the meeting
How nice to see you again!

tr: come upon, as if by accident
example: We find this idea in Plato
I happened upon the most wonderful bakery not very far from here
She chanced upon an interesting book in the bookstore the other day
The project ran into numerous financial difficulties
My proposal met with much opposition

value.def: If you encounter problems or difficulties, you experience them.

example.ex: Every day of our lives we encounter stresses of one kind or another...
example.tran: 我们在每天的生活中会面临这样或那样的压力。

example.ex: Environmental problems they found in Poland were among the worst they encountered.
example.tran: 他们在波兰发现的环境问题是他们遇到过的最严重的。

value.def: If you encounter someone, you meet them, usually unexpectedly.

example.ex: Did you encounter anyone in the building?...
example.tran: 你在大楼里遇到谁了么？

example.ex: Renata wrote him that she had encountered her long-estranged father.
example.tran: 雷娜塔写信告诉他说她碰到了分离多年的父亲。

value.def: An encounter with someone is a meeting with them, particularly one that is unexpected or significant.

example.ex: The author tells of a remarkable encounter with a group of South Vietnamese soldiers.
example.tran: 作者讲述了和一群南越士兵的奇遇。

value.def: An encounter is a particular type of experience.

example.tran: 他第一次正儿八经喝酒的经历

trans: 交心心理治疗团体，会心团体(成员定期聚集)
